attributes.action: hold a General Election on Thursday November 5th 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
November 5th is a very historic day in our parliament's history, a day which celebrates saving our parliament from the Gunpowder Plot in 1605.
Holding a general election on this day would really galvanize the public into getting out and voting in what would be a very historic election.
Our parliament need saving again, what better date.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
